description: Floating wharves construction and installation at Little Judique Ponds, Inverness County, Nova Scotia. Construction services, general marine construction work and like for like replacement of existing floating wharves. hasThrough schedule deadline July 31, 2023.

full_summary:
**Floating Wharves Construction and Installation – Little Judique Ponds, Nova Scotia**

**Notice Reference:** PW-23-01020126

**Publication Date:** 2023-01-05
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-20T13:00:00 (Expired)

**Project Overview:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is inviting qualified contractors to participate in a Request for Qualification (RFQ) for the construction and installation of (5) timber floating wharves at Little Judique Ponds, Inverness County, Nova Scotia.

**Work Scope:**

The successful contractor will be responsible for furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for the construction and installation of (5) timber floating wharves. The existing (5) floating wharves must be removed and disposed of in accordance with the tender documents. The replacement floating wharves will be constructed on a like-for-like basis, with the same dimensions and specifications as the current installations (9’x54’ typical SCH floating wharves).

**Contract Period:**

The Contractor must complete the work by July 31st, 2023.

**Eligibility:**

The RFQ is open to all qualified contractors who have experience in general marine construction work. The successful contractor must be able to demonstrate their experience and capabilities in delivering floating wharf construction projects.

**Submission Requirements:**

A detailed Request for Proposal (RFP) document is attached to this notice. Interested contractors must provide a written proposal outlining their qualifications, experience, and approach to delivering the project.

**Contracting Entity:**

The contracting authority is Fisheries and Oceans Canada, with offices located at 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6.

**Contact Information:**

Kimberly Martin
Senior Contracting Authority
Fisheries and Oceans Canada
506-429-2397
[kimberlydawn.martin@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:kimberlydawn.martin@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

Please note that the deadline for submission has passed. The RFQ is no longer open for tender. 

Please let me know if you want me to add anything else to this re-write. I have formatted the new entry in a clear and concise manner to ensure that it is easy to read and understand. I have also avoided any extraneous information and only included the most relevant details. 

Best regards,
Ana
